com.continuuity.weave.api
Interface WeavePreparer

public interface WeavePreparer

This interface exposes methods to set up the Weave runtime environment and start a Weave application.

Method Summary
 WeavePreparer addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
          Adds a LogHandler for receiving an application log.
 WeavePreparer addSecureStore(SecureStore secureStore)
          Adds security credentials for the runtime environment to gives application access to resources.

          Deprecated. This method will be removed in future version.

          Starts the application.

          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name.

          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name.
 WeavePreparer withClassPaths(Iterable<String> classPaths)

addLogHandler

WeavePreparer addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
Adds a LogHandler for receiving an application log.

Parameters:
handler - The LogHandler.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

setUser

@Deprecated
WeavePreparer setUser(String user)
Deprecated. This method will be removed in future version.

Sets the user name that runs the application. Default value is get from "user.name" by calling System.getProperty(String).

Parameters:
user - User name
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

withApplicationArguments

WeavePreparer withApplicationArguments(String... args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application. The arguments can be retrieved from WeaveContext.getApplicationArguments().

Parameters:
args - Array of arguments.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

withArguments

Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name. The arguments can be retrieved from WeaveContext.getArguments().

This WeavePreparer.

See Also:
withDependencies(Iterable)

withDependencies

WeavePreparer withDependencies(Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
Adds extra classes that the application is dependent on and is not traceable from the application itself. E.g. Class name used in Class.forName(String).

Parameters:
classes - set of classes to add to dependency list for generating the deployment jar.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

withResources

WeavePreparer withResources(URI... resources)
Adds resources that will be available through the ClassLoader of the runnables.

Returns:
This WeavePreparer.
See Also:
withResources(Iterable)

withResources

WeavePreparer withResources(Iterable<URI> resources)
Adds resources that will be available through the ClassLoader of the runnables. Useful for adding extra resource files or libraries that are not traceable from the application itself. If the URI is a jar file, classes inside would be loadable by the ClassLoader. If the URI is a directory, everything underneath would be available.

Parameters:
resources - Set of URI to the resources.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

withClassPaths

WeavePreparer withClassPaths(String... classPaths)
Adds the set of paths to the classpath on the target machine for all runnables.

Returns:
This WeavePreparer
See Also:
withClassPaths(Iterable)

withClassPaths

WeavePreparer withClassPaths(Iterable<String> classPaths)
Adds the set of paths to the classpath on the target machine for all runnables. Note that the paths would be just added without verification.

Parameters:
classPaths - Set of classpaths
Returns:
This WeavePreparer

addSecureStore

WeavePreparer addSecureStore(SecureStore secureStore)
Adds security credentials for the runtime environment to gives application access to resources.

Parameters:
secureStore - Contains security token available for the runtime environment.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

start

WeaveController start()
Starts the application.

Returns:
A WeaveController for controlling the running application.
